import React, { useState } from 'react' import './newsletter.css' import {Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap' import subscribe from '../assets/images/subscribe.png' const Newsletter = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Perform database submission or other necessary actions console.log(`Submitted email: ${email}`); setEmail(''); // Reset the email input }; return

Subscribe now to get our annual promos!

setEmail(e.target.value)} />

Explore stunning destinations, experience local traditions, and create unforgettable memories with MemoRide.
} export default Newsletter
